page.title: 07Ponteland Local Plan
page.content: Ponteland has become the second largest town in Castle Morpeth Borough Therefore the council have decided to issue a draft Local Plan so that the public can give their views before decisions are taken. the Plan is to cover a period up to 1996. THE PLAN. {Housing.}New building sites need to be determined so as not to change the character of Ponteland.Sites for 180 new houses will be required. To re-examine the {Green Belt } boundaries of the parish.{A Bypass } has been proposed for the past 50 years.There two routes being proposed involving the Callerton Lane link road The modest {Shopping }facilities are considered inadequate,consideration will be given to new developments to complement the present range of shops. {Recreational}needs will be examined.
